_header: As a man rode fast by the way
Title(s): ‘The wordes of a good horse to his mayster’
_description: ‘The wordes of a good horse to his mayster’ — seven couplets, with rubric: ‘In illis diebus when horse coude speake’

Plimpton259.First Lines:
As a man rode faste by þe wayto him these wordes his horse did
                    say…
Plimpton259.Last Lines:
…which if þi selfe to se take paynefull well þi
                    þankes I will quite againe
Plimpton259.Note:
MS written by a hand or hands of the sixteenth century; 7 x 2 first 8
                    lines written as if quatrains.
Plimpton259.Attributed Title:
The wordes of a good horse to his mayster / In illis diebus when
                    horse coude speake
